edus.text: the methods we used to decide on current trends and so on , market trends , were that we did our traditional our usual market research study with hundred subjects and the general feedback from them is that the most im i'm slightly tongue-tied after lunch , project manager .

edus.text: also with our company being forerunners in putting fashion into technology , we also looked at fashion update using our consultants on fashion and design in paris and milan .
edus.speaker: D

edus.text: so the general findings from that was in the market trends the most important aspect for remote controls were people want fancy look and feel , rather than the current functional look and feel of remote controls .
edus.speaker: D

edus.text: they also want remote control to be technologically innovative , and , as we predicted , that it should be easy to use .
edus.speaker: D

edus.text: now should point out that the first of those findings , fancy look and feel , is the most important , is twice as important as the second , technologically innovative , which is in turn twice as important as being easy to use .
edus.speaker: D

edus.text: so possibly that the feature that we put first is actually third is still important , but it's third in order of preference for the subject group we looked at .

edus.text: , now the fashion update which relates to very personal preferences among our subject group , we found from our consultants in paris and milan who des attended all the design and fashion fairs there , that fruit and vegetables are going to be the theme for clothes , shoes and furniture .
